0.7.0.name: knex
0.7.0.description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.test: npm run jshint && istanbul --config=test/.istanbul.yml cover _mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -b -R spec test/index.js
scripts.release:patch: gulp jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type patch && gulp release
scripts.release:minor: gulp jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type minor && gulp release

scripts.release:patch: npm run jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type patch && gulp release
scripts.release:minor: npm run jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type minor && gulp release

0.7.6.name: knex
0.7.6.description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.test: npm run jshint && istanbul --config=test/.istanbul.yml cover _mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -b -R spec test/index.js
scripts.release:patch: gulp jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type patch && gulp release
scripts.release:minor: gulp jshint && npm test && gulp build && gulp bump --type minor && gulp release

0.8.0.name: knex
0.8.0.description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser

scripts.plaintest: mocha --check-leaks -t 10000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape && gulp jshint
scripts.test: istanbul --config=test/.istanbul.yml cover _mocha -- --check-leaks -t 5000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape && npm run jshint
